content.detailedDescription:
This upload of video clips are recorded from 22 to 26 june 2016, in the terrace of my house, where every night i made observations of phenomenon`s in the night sky. 
in this clips mufon can visualize 3 different kind of technologies of flight, to the video of the "splash ufos" it is necessary to reduce the speed of reproduction to 30%, they are very difficult to see, in one clip there are a buzz noise which only when i played i listen, never have done such noise the cam. in one of the clips there are a plane passing by, but it was in other direction. i am registering all to look after patterns, they show up like that in certain regions of the sky, and i am a lucky b... i would like to share this, but i am barking on the moon. second year looking at the sky, every time the weather permits.
i apologise for the bad image, but nothing it is prepared, this things happen in a second. thank you!
sal
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very fast orb like-star s to n

content.detailedDescription: My dad noticed this star shape moving in the sky going in different directions but in a straight line kinda i grabbed my cell phone to record and we started to notice a black shadow thing going fast around the bright star in all directions we got the black shadow it's at the 2 second mark in the video top left of the screen
content.summary: Star flying in different direction black shadow following

content.detailedDescription: My name is behren valiukas, im 35 and i lived in sedona az from 1994-2009 when then i moved to buffalo ny.  i recently took a trip back to sedona to see my family. it was the first time back to sedona in five years and my girlfriend and i stayed with my parents there.  i was excited to see the beautiful sky and also got a couple powerful star pointers to add to the fun of the trip.  we arrived in sedona on 6-15 and every night we started going out to look at the stars and play with the lasers.  the moon was full the third night we were there so i was a little disappointed we couldn't see the stars better but it was still amazing.  every night we went outside at some point watching the stars and counting dozens of satellite and jetliners.   on the night of 6-23, my dad and i started watching the sky around 10:15pm right out in the dark street in front of the house.  i caught a couple shooting stars but there was a small strip of cloud above us that the moon had slightly aluminated, and it was partially blocking out the stars straight above.  after 30 min of an uneventful sky i started to point my laser at the cloud directly above me seeing if i could see the laser on the cloud at all.  i held it on the cloud for a min, blinked it a couple times then before i knew it something aluminted in in the cloud right next to where i pointed my laser.  the cloud was wispy and low.  the object in the clouds would glow so bright it was intimidating.  my dad and i froze, and just watched.  it would light up every ten secs or so aluminating the cloud around it then moving a short distance before aluminating againg.  at this point i ran inside and grabbed my girlfriend, i said "honey ufo!".  she ran outside just as it lit up again on the edge of the cloud, move a little ways, then aluminated again.  it moved out of the cloud and into night sky as we watched it now aluminating and appearing out of the black.  i ran back inside, got my mom out of bed and she ran out to watch it move off to the west with the rest of us. we could see it glowing more orange in the distance appearing and dissapearing in the dark. we were just speechless. my last night was the next night and my mom and i spent some time outside looking at the sky again and after some time i believe we saw the same object off at a distance over the mountains for just a min or two.  my parents are not the type of people to talk about ufo, but over the last year my interest in them has peaked.  i knew they were out there but in all my years i had seen nothing and my parents had not either.  i think my dad my be a little in shock by what we saw.  i have not been able to stop thinking about it. my girlfriend is speechless too.  one strange note about this is that we all know it happened right at 10:45pm.  i know it happened at that time too, but when i think back and remember myself running up the porch into my house to get my girlfriend, i always see it as daytime in my head.  i think its because i was in such shock and excitement but i thought i should mention it.  i feel like this thing we saw stays over that area because we caught it that second night.  someone else has had to have seen this thing.  i want to find out the truth about what i saw now...Its hard to stop seeing in my head, especially after traveling back home to buffalo yesterday and being super tired.  i hope this can get some answers....
content.summary: Family witnessed straight above at low altitude an aluminating craft after using star pointers/lasers, aluminating intense light every 10 secs or so, hovered, glided, duration 4 min, saw second night at distance, still shaken...

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were relaxing in our backyard around 10:30 pm on 6/25/16  when my wife suddenly said what is that, look, look as i looked up we observed a reddish orange orb approaching from the south moving north. very bright that wasn't descending maybe less than 1000 feet. we got a very good look at it for about 5 seconds it then moved were we could see it though the tree canopy it was so bright that if we repositioned our self we could see it arcing towards the northwest. no sound, moving faster than a plane or helicopter. we live near a approach pattern for the local airport. we see and hear aircraft all the time. we have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Seen approaching from the south. very intence reddish orange. no sound, maybe less than 1000 feet at a 50 degree angle looking east.

content.detailedDescription: I was stepping out my back door to take my leashed dog out. i immediately noticed my steps and yard were bathed in a yellow light. i looked up, expecting an incredible moon. instead, a triangle was moving slowly and diagonally across my yard, from east to west. there was no noise whatsoever. the craft was much lower than the small planes i see but above treetop level. my dog, a maltese, did not react. the lights were yellow/gold and extremely bright...Two at the back and one at the tip. they seemed very large and round. if i held my arm out i would say it was as big as my thumb.  it continued toward my front yard and trees blocked my view. i tried to pull my dog and catch sight of it on the other side of the trees. it was gone. as it had left my view, the yard was back to normal light wise. just the small light at my door gave illumination and i was in mostly darkness. the event lasted about 2 minutes. i practically ran back inside and told my husband and drew what i saw.
content.summary: Triangle flew silently over my yard, bathing the area in yellow light from the bright lights.

content.detailedDescription:
During the hours of 11:00 pm, in the durham region of ontario, canada, over ajax, whitby and possibly pickering, five friends of mine and i had decided to take a late night stroll. within two minutes of our walk and leaving my house, in the north direction, i noticed the sky was very clear. i could see many stars, and especially the typical airplane lights. over the horizon to the east-southeast, three orange orbs started to appear in view, slowly making their way into view, heading west-southwest. the further into view, the more orbs began to appear. there were more than a dozen orbs, extremely bright in the sky. their brightness' dimmed and increased seemingly at random, pulsing like so with gentle transitions. they all moved together in harmonized formation, looking kind of like the outline of the horseshoe nebula formation. they were hovering for the most part and at the least, three times brighter than the brightest start in the sky. their brightness was more prominent than the moon. at first, i had no idea, then my initial response was ufo's, possibly of intelligent origin. i called my friends over to see if they saw it as well, as all five witnessed this. at the time, the orbs had ceased their movement in the sky and simply hovered. some orbs began to glow much brighter than others. a couple started to move in two separate directions, glowing further red until vanishing.

during those three minutes, we all attempted to capture video or imagery, but our cameras on our phones were not working at their normal quality. video produced nothing but black film, but the photo came out decently ok. by the end of roughly three minutes, the orbs all began moving in their own directions, sometimes circling back to their original position, and each faded away one-by-one, until four remained in the sky in the orion's belt formation, for another minute. i ran to get my mother to witness the sighting. she witnessed the last four orbs, before they, too, vanished with a blink.

another couple of minutes passed when we decided to continue our walk, after the event had occurred. again, over the east-southeast horizon, i, and two of my friends, witnessed a much larger orb, glowing a translucent greenish-blue, while it possessed an even fainter aura of bright blue around it. it's flight path was clearly a descent, making its way roughly 150km/h. it made no sound, and took a full minute and a half to descend before it became out of view beyond the horizon.

after the sightings had stopped, several jets were seen in the area, all traveling in random directions. as well, each of us (the witnesses) responded and reported different feelings: shock, confusion, excitement; except one that was common for every individual: extremely energized. like being given a large dose of caffeine or sugar, that lasted several hours.

p.S. the following night, in the same general horizon location, a solitary orb of the same bright, orange/red was seen traveling slowly west-northwest, in a gradual curved path, until blinking very bright and vanishing in the blink of an eye.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Dozens of orbs; one descends

content.detailedDescription:
I was in in the backyard with my telescope observing saturn and mars.

i started to walk indoors to get some water and noticed a bright which i though to be a plane but the color was off and it was not blinking.

i proceeded it watch it change direction and ascend out of view.  i thought perhaps it was a flare but cannot explain why it would move up?

at this point i noticed another light coming from the same direction followed by three more in a triangle pattern.  these all ascended to the east and followed a similar pattern.  

these objects looked fiery and i grabbed my wife to come see.  over the course of 5 minutes we observed ~15 more similar objects.  the 10th or so one was larger and had smaller ones circling it which it appeared to then absorb.

we were both a little frightened as we had never seen anything similar.  eventually all objects seemed to move too far to be observed.

the following day i just observed an unmarked black hawk circling in the vicinity of where we saw the lights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Series of lights ascending to the east, forming patterns then fading out

content.detailedDescription: Watching fireworks with friends and family in a warehouse parking lot. noticed something interesting out of the corner of my eye. definitely thought it was a ufo... object was monitoring and observing the fireworks. i was excited to share this opportunity with my family and friends. object then disappeared above the fireworks.
content.summary: Magic

content.detailedDescription: 3 red lights. one above the other two. drifted away quickly. not planes. lower then planes and not a straight path. appeared to be descending  then ascending then descending. only could get a picture  of 1 of the. trees in the way
content.summary: 3 red lights low

content.detailedDescription: We was leaving a motorcycle race track that we was building in roanoke tx my brother saw it frist an said hey look at the moon it looks funny so i looked up to see it and i had to look though my winshild of my car but when i saw it. i didn't think it was the moon but i knew it was something very strange i looked around in my car looking for the real moon but couldn't find it so i told my brother we're gonna hear about this on the news tonight when we get home because this don't happen every day.An i told him we'll whatever it is i've got to drive so i quit looking at it and went on about my driving. an my brother said look the moon is falling. so i looked up thinking i was gonna see the moon burning out like a falling star or something like that. and the next words out of my mouth was falling hell it's flying and i knew it wasn't the moon it changed directions several times before stopping right above my car in mid air my mouth was hanging open while my brother was having panic attack or some kind of a mental brake down i just kept on watching it with amazement but after a while of him screaming at me to stop the car i couldn't concentrate on watching the ufo so i hollered at him to shut the ---- up and i told him i've got a 351winsor under the hood of my mustang .... and you want to get out and run on foot i said just shut up and watch the g.D.Thing.! so he was trying to regain his composer and we both kept watching the most amazing thing ive ever seen and after a few more minutes it took the same course it took down and went back up to where it was but only for a few seconds or maybe a minute then it took three more courses up heading up in too the star's and it looked just like a star but it kept going till it past the star's an got smaller and smaller till we could no longer see it anymore. every since then i don't think our government is laying to us i know they are lying to us. and it's  really upsetting to me to know that (we the people) are not (we the people anymore) now it's (we the people and the government and them) because we ain't alone that forsure. and anybody that thinks we are all their is.. is just stupid ,stupid,stupid...!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: We thought it was the moon it was so big it came down and hovered over my car an then went back where we frist daw it an then it went up in the stars and past them till we could no longer see it.. awesome changed my life

content.detailedDescription: Found at last frame of my grandson iphone taping a rainbow
content.summary: Too fast fraction of a second

content.detailedDescription: I was just snapping pictures and this object appeared. i didn't feel anything.
content.summary: Object appeared on photo

content.detailedDescription:
Watched plane (we thought) flying over, e-se, high up.  it stopped while we looked at it.  it flashed 6x.  it then moved backwards, then stopped again.  it flashed 6x very fast.  it had flashed 3x total with the fast 6x pulses.  it then began a controlled, rapid descent until it was gone from sight over our local trees.  object was over sun city.  altitude looked like 6000 or 7000 feet when it was firs spotted.  very high up.  next to jupiter in the sky, just to the left of it at exactly 9:20 pm.

really wild.  my brother was with me and i had just told him about seeing a red ufo, when we saw this red light flying up where i had pointed out the location, and there it stopped and flashed 6x very fast, like a very fast strobe, or a signal.

flashes occurred 3x, 3 groups of 6 pulses, very fast, bright.

i grabbed my binoculars when it reversed course and stopped again.  in the glasses, i noticed it had a green light, which wasnt visible when looking at it with just normal vision.  bright red, like a brake light.

when it was flying (before it stopped), it wasnt going terribly fast.  when it stopped, it was instant.  when it reversed course, it was fast and smooth, same speed, not super fast, then stopped again.  flashed 6x.  hovered.  when it would hover, it was perhaps for 5 long seconds, approximately.

when it began its descent, it was constant, and straight down.  it was down out of sight on the horizon in seconds.  a guess would be 100 knots straight down? looked smooth though, wasnt terribly fast.

came in shortly later. no helicopter was visible.

red light was in the left, green on the right, which would mean it was traveling backwards if it was proper nav lights on a plane.  red should have been on the right, pilots side, when flying along in its direction of travel.

when it stopped, it didnt slow down, it 'stopped'.  instant stop.  super still hover.  moved backwards for 1 full long second, stopped again.  when it stopped, it would flash bright pulses, very fast, about 6 times, each time, 3 groups of flashes total.

my brother witnessed this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red light.  in binoculars, it also had a green light.  bright flashes occurred 3x.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my wife and adult daughter had just left the movie theater in fenton missouri. as i was getting into my car i noticed a bright ruby red light flying in a northerly direction at 1500 to 2000 feet altitude with an airspeed of approximately 150 mph. there were no directional nor any anti collision lights flashing.There was no sound coming from the object. it was silent. it flew at an altitude that a helicopter would fly at but no sound. the object flew out of sight towards the city of st.Louis. i was very astounded at what i witnessed as i have over 25 years experience as an aircraft mechanic working for a major defense contractor working in their experimental and flight operations. what i saw did not look or behave like any standard flying aircraft.The lighting for flying at night did not conform to faa standards.
content.summary: Ruby red object flew south to north with no visible anti collision or directional lights. no sound. airspeed approx. 150 mph. altitude of 1500-2000 feet.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around snapping pictures. i have a weird feeling the someone was watching me. it appeared to be an alien holding a gun or so it appears. the being just stood there staring at me. this happened at the high school.
content.summary: Alien being appeared out of thin air

content.detailedDescription: I was just walking around snapping random pictures when i noticed this object appear on the photo. i automatically recognized it as a ufo. i felt a little sick after.
content.summary: Object appeared after taking photo

content.detailedDescription: There was a weird flash and the object appeared. i noticed this car parked on the side of the road so i decided to snap a picture. there was a weird flash the moment i snapped the picture. i noticed a big bee appear. it just appeared to be floating in one spot. the object just disappeared after.
content.summary: Large bee appeared on photo

content.detailedDescription: I was going home from the park looking toward east i believe and noticed the sun as it was coming up and saw how the sunbeams looked so i decided to take a picture.  it wasn't until almost two weeks later i was looking at the photo i took because i was thinking of maybe using it as wallpaper for my computer screen.  as i enlarged the photo i noticed at least two objects near one of the clouds so i checked online to see if anybody else had submitted anything on that day and didn't find anything so i decided to submit my photo to see what it was i captured. i only took 1 photo so i made a copy and placed a circle on one of them where it looks like the objects are.
content.summary: I was going home and decided to take a photo it wasn't until now i noticed the 2 objects.

content.detailedDescription: I just started taking pictures and the object appeared.
content.summary: Appeared in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I live on the last floor of an apartment building where there is an opening where i can see the sky and there are two towers 19.69 feet apart from each other and about 26.25 high. it was night time and i went out to see the stars. i rarely do it. suddenly i saw this black v shaped object about 6.56 wide and maybe the same size long and very thin. under the object, on the front bottom was a round orange light and under both wings  2 more orange lights. it was very near to one of the towers. it appeared in the middle of the towers and went north. 

when i saw it i felt much peace and joy! i ran to the edge of the apartment to see it as it went above the tower and to my surprise it disappeared. there were no clouds, the sky was clear. the moment it disappeared, 2 enormous white owls appeared. my thought was "if the owls were in any way linked to the object"!

the feeling of peace and joy continued on for days for it touched me deeply. the owls continued to appear for weeks close to my porch. one of the nights one of them almost went thru my room window. they would be around my apartment and i'd even talk to them. till one night an insect which i don't like frightened me and i stopped going to the porch. they never came back. only this year did i hear their sound again but they never came near again.

i do believe my vibration lowered and it affected the owls.

i have tried to find a picture that would look similar to what i saw and what i found follows although the one i saw was much smaller.
content.summary: A v shaped object with one orange light at the front and 2 more on each side. appeared and disappeared in seconds above my apartment. looked very thin.

content.detailedDescription: My middle son and i were in the backyard working on mowing. my son was finishing push mowing the last 3rd of the yard and my oldest son came outside and spotted the vessel slowly passing by silently, up at about a 50 -60 degrees from the horizon. my middle son got done mowing and came to see what we were looking at. my oldest son said we should take a picture but my camera phone couldn't see it because the sky was so blue that you couldn't see it on the view finder. so my son suggested getting the telescope, so i ran into my garage and got the telescope. i looked through the aiming scope on the side to aim the telescope at the object. i looked at it through the telescope and it was cylinder shaped and chrome-like. i couldn't see windows. there were no wings and no visible means of propulsion. it made no sounds. through the telescope you could see it was clearly solid and metallic. i couldn't see insignia or writing anywhere on it. it was smooth and the ends were rounded not flat but it was cylinder shaped between the ends. after observing the object through the telescope for about 15 seconds, it took off and was out of sight in about 3-4 seconds. i posted on facebook about it and there was another witness seeing it flying to the nw away from us toward fort wayne, in. my neighbor's mother was out but she is pretty old and needed a walker. she didn't see it herself but seen our reaction. she mentioned that back in the 1940s and 1950s they [herself and others] seen many ufos that flew around our area all the time back then. many that flew much faster than the planes of the time.
content.summary: Bright silver object that looked cylinder shaped. looked at it with telescope also.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work and noticed a glowing light in the sky ended once before i can get out of the car got out an object begins passing again from the same direction it started the second witness my mother came out to witness the object pass again we called the police a unit showed up witnessed it the first time and then video taped it on its second pass while the police officer was was taking video of the object police officer did not know what the object was i passed one more time and it was gone the fourth witness was a cousin of the family who witnessed the object three times before the officer showed up this object started at 1 point in the sky and it on left on the other end of the sky and then showed up again at the same point of origin and followed the same path to the other end of the sky seven times
content.summary: 4 witnesses including 1 police officer obseved multiple passes of glowing orb from 1 end of sky to other

content.detailedDescription: Took this digital video,which is attached,of chemtrails being sprayed over me in the middle of a sunny day last february,2016 in gardnerville,nevada.At roughly halfway through2 minutes in,you can hear me say" what the hell is that,then i point the camera at it,you will plainly see it...Enjoy gentlemen.No tricks just want to get someone else,s opinion.
content.summary: Took this digital video of chemtrailing over agardnerville nevada and at about two minutes into it there was a ??? flying to my northeast,so i pointed my ipad in that direction,what it is is anybody,s guess!?!

content.detailedDescription: Craft appeared to hover, then veered off to the left of the video. there were high winds in the area and frequent lightning. the object was apparently not an airplane or helicopter, could be a drone or weather craft of some kind. it had three red lights which pulsated, and one on the bottom and appeared to be an oval shape.
content.summary: A friend of mine who lives in central square sent me a video of a dark objects with three red lights on top and one underneath. there were violent storms in the area, and the objeect doesn't appear to be an airplane or helicopter.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was walking in the rural area behind walmart, and noticed a buzzard making circles in the sky. it flew east and then i saw the ufo above a tree line (east of me). the object was white, pulsating, and moving slowly toward the south. there was no chemtrail or contrail behind it. as i was looking, it stopped in the air and hovered in the same spot for several minutes, continuing to pulsate. this is why i know it was not any known conventional aircraft. i felt like it knew i was observing it. after i realized it was not going to come any closer, i stopped looking. i was elated as i observed this object. i do have a couple photos and video footage, but the quality is so poor, i could barely make it out. i could not zoom in. it would take special software to zoom in and distinguish between the pixels. i don't think the photos and video footage is good enough to send you, but if you can clear things up with special software, let me know.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White pulsating orb moving south, then stops and hovers for several minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Kids were playing basketball in the front of the house. they noticed a shinny object around 5:15 in the east, called us to come look, but we didn't. around 10'mins later, they said the object is still there, so i headed to observe. the object had moved slightly to the north since they had first observed it. it was shinny, looked to be pulsing or rotating as it got brighter than fainter in a short cycle.  it was pretty still for 10'minutes or so, called my wife out to look. after another 5 minutes or is, it started moving faster in a straight line to the nort east where it went behind our house and we lost sight of it. total observed time was about 45 mins.
content.summary: Hovering pulsating orb that headed off slowly in northeast direction. very high, clear day but at least at cloud height

content.detailedDescription:
On june 23, 2016, i was driving home from work in houston heading west toward katy on i-10. it was around 6:20pm so the sun was still high in the sky. it was sunny and partly cloudy. a shiny object in the sky caught my eye. i would say that it was like an oval-ish shape, i couldn't see any sharp edges but it was solid. the reflection was bright and it made it hard to see the actual shape of the object was. i did not see it appear, i just happened to notice it. i was around i-10 and dairy ashford and it was on my right, north of i-10. it was wasn't too high but it wasn't too low on the horizon to where the view of it could be obstructed by trees or anything. i just stared at it. there was some traffic so i wasn't driving too fast so i was able to see if it had a trajectory path but it did not move, it stayed at the same position. i was trying to see if it was a plane, but the way that it shone, it could have not been because it wasn't small enough, the refection was too bright and it would require a lot more surface area. the shape of a small plane could of not have cast the amount to light or reflection that this object did and from that distance, it would of been too small anyway. at first all i could notice was the bright reflective surface, but the more i looked, i could see that it was silver on the bottom part. again, it was hard to see the actual shape of the object, but it was solid. 

there is a small airport on groschke road that is between barker cypress and hwy 6. i occasionally see small planes take off so its not out of ordinary for me to see things in the sky, i have even seen colorful hot air ballons come from south of i-10 in katy, i am not too sure where exactly they come from but it has been a while since i have seen those. however, this object or i guess ufo was rather large but at the same time seemed far away. if i would guess where the ufo was on top of, i would guess that it was between the mason rd to fry rd and saums to clay rd area. so as i am driving i pass under the hwy 6 overpass and when i look at the same spot in the sky, it was gone. i looked around to see if it moved lower or higher but it was nowhere. the hwy 6 overpass only obstructed my view for about 5 seconds. the length of time that i saw this ufo was no more than 1 minute. when i first saw it i felt curious and i was thinking of all the possibilites of what this could of been. when i continued to see it, i felt kind of confused because i couldn't understand what the object was and when it disappeared quickly i was just shocked and i also felt upset at myself for not taking a picture of it. i am sure that it would of been visible. 

if somebody knows what this object was or if you saw it too, please leave a comment. i have been trying to forget or to talk myself out of thinking that i saw a ufo. i am not one of those kind of people that think that there are aliens out there or those that do a lot of research on conspiracy theories but i cannot explain what could that could have been but i know what i saw. i can't talk myself out of this and forget it so i wanted to let others know. sorry this is so long but i wanted to be highly descriptive!
content.summary: Saw highly reflective object in the sky and it disappeared suddenly

content.detailedDescription:
First of all, i did not see or hear the so called meteor that flashed through the eastern arizona skies at what was reported to be 03:57am mst and apparently was also visible in utah, new mexico, california, texas, and nevada. 

i was standing at the 19th avenue and northern train station at 4:48 am when i noticed what appeared to be high altitude missile contrails due east in the illuminated sky just prior to sunrise. i have seen these contrails on many occasions usually occurring right before if not at sunrise. these occurrences are usually explained as being missile tests from white sands, new mexico which is east northeast about 410 miles away. 

i am employed within the aerospace industry and one of the projects i am certified on is the "thaad" (thermal high altitude aerial defense) program, and that is all i will say about that subject.

being that i was standing there looking at what appeared to be scattered contrails, i decided to snap a couple pictures with my phone camera. i showed a few people at work that day but didn't really look closely at the pictures for a week or so. 

i have a friend on the east coast that i sent the first of the 3 pictures to and after the fact is when i noticed the anomaly. 

on the first picture along the right border there appears to be an illuminated object which when zoomed appears to be a large distant cylindrical craft with the curved bottom illuminated by the rising sun. in the second picture it appears to be turning, and in the third it is gone. i snapped these one after the other and all 3 are time stamped at 04:49am mst. 

moments ago, just prior to starting this report, i searched the web and found multiple you-tube videos that show that same anomaly. i am certain you will search them for yourself if this anomaly hasn't already been acknowledged. i find it hard to believe that i am the only observer that has noticed this. i am attaching a forth photo, which is actually the first photo with the area cropped out, blown up in size, and pasted on top next to where the actual object is pictured. 

several years ago i submitted a report and it was explained away as "chinese lanterns" which i excepted as a reasonable explanation for what i saw. please explain this.
content.summary: Smoke or contrail left in easter morning sky after earlier meteor flash, object to the right.

content.detailedDescription:
Note: the witness is incapable of entering data into a computer. so, i, the field investigator, am entering the data for her, as told to me. the month and date of the incident are approximate, while the year, 1973, is definite. the primary witness and two other witnesses were driving about 9 pm from eden prairie, mn west toward waconia, mn, approximately 12 miles to the west. the two passenger witnesses are deceased or do not remember anything about the incident. 

in eden prairie, the witness sighted a brightly shining triangular shaped object approximately a mile to the west of her car. the light shining from the object was so bright that the witness was unable to discern any possible lights at the vertices or the center of the triangular object. the witness immediately thought the object was a ufo. as she drove further she could see the top of the ufo, apparently because the object went down a hill in front of the witness. the object paced her car as she drove west and once again she was beneath the object. when in waconia, the witness drove directly under the object or else the object slowed enough or stopped  enabling her to drive under the object which was approximately 150 ft overhead. the light beneath the object was extremely bright and cast a circle of light approximately 50 ft in diameter. the light was so bright that the witness could barely see the road but she accelerated and got ahead of the light. after that, she could see neither the object, nor the light cast by the object. the witness was very excited by her sighting but suffered no physical symptoms of distress.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo, casting a very bright light, moving west to east was observed for a distance of 12 miles

content.detailedDescription: I was home. i took three pictures on the moon at approx 7am. later in the day i looked at my photos. the last picture had a black dot near the moon. when i enlarged it, i was amazed and confused. i did not see anything at the time of the picture. i wish i had. not sure if i have taking a picture of a ufo?? i looked at the picture in black and white and the top and bottom of the item looks highlighted.
content.summary: Unknown object in my picture
